about_the_game:
What is iVRy?


• iVRy is an app for your Mobile Device, Samsung GearVR or Oculus Go/Quest/Quest 2 headset with a Virtual Reality headset driver for SteamVR. The Virtual Reality headset driver for SteamVR also includes Sony PSVR headset support.

What does that mean?


• Want to play PC VR* (Virtual Reality) titles without having to buy a dedicated VR headset?
• With iVRy, a compatible iOS or Android Mobile Device and VR headset you can!
• Also supports GearVR/Oculus Go/Quest/Quest 2, Lenovo Mirage Solo and Sony PSVR headsets.
• Supports Wired (USB) connections for greater visual quality and performance.
• Supports Wireless (Wifi) connections for greater mobility.
• Automatically adjusts quality to maintain optimal frame rates on all connection types.
• User configurable quality and performance options.
• User configurable vignette options.
• Use your VR headset manufacturer's Cardboard QR code for optimal lens distortion correction and field-of-view.
• Integrates with SteamVR, so no 'manager' / 'server' apps or additional configuration required.
• Includes SteamVR Dashboard overlay, to change driver settings in VR.
• Built-in support for NoloVR 6DOF tracking and motion controllers.
• Compatible with most HTC Vive and Oculus Rift** titles.
• This edition has all of the features of the Mobile Device "Premium" edition, but will start to reduce color saturation after being connected for more than 5 minutes. Upgrade to "Premium" edition via Steam DLC or In-App Purchase to remove this limitation.

* Valve OpenVR/SteamVR. Requires Valve Steam & SteamVR on Windows 7 or later.
** Oculus Rift titles require Valve SteamVR, Oculus Home & 3rd party 'LibreVR Revive' software.
detailed_description:
Demo

This is the DEMO ("Lite") version of the iVRy Driver for SteamVR with Mobile Device and Samsung GearVR or Oculus Go/Quest/Quest 2 headset support. It has all of the features of "Premium" edition, but will start to reduce color saturation after being connected for more than 5 minutes.

To remove this limitation when using the Android or iOS Mobile Device apps, upgrade to the "Premium" version via the Google Play or Apple App stores, OR:

iVRy Driver for SteamVR (Mobile Device Premium Edition)

To remove this limitation when using the Samsung GearVR, Oculus Go or Oculus Quest/Quest 2 headset app installed from Steam, upgrade to the "GearVR/Oculus Premium" version via:

iVRy Driver for SteamVR (GearVR/Oculus Premium Edition)

To remove this limitation when using the Oculus Quest/Quest 2 "Lite" app, installed from Oculus App Lab, upgrade to the "Premium" version via the Oculus App Store.


Android/iOS Mobile Device

In order to use the iVRy Driver for SteamVR for Android and iOS Mobile Devices, you will need to download the 'iVRy' app from your Mobile Device's app store OR for Android Mobile Devices from:

iVRy for SteamVR (Android/Daydream App Installer)


GearVR/Oculus Go/Quest/Quest 2

In order to use the iVRy Driver for SteamVR for Samsung GearVR or Oculus Go/Quest/Quest 2 headsets, you will need to install the iVRy GearVR/Oculus app from:

iVRy for SteamVR (GearVR/Oculus App Installer)


Pico G2/Neo2/Neo3/Pico4

In order to use the iVRy Driver for SteamVR for Pico headsets, you will need to install the iVRy Pico app from:

iVRy for SteamVR (Pico App Installer)


Sony PSVR/PSVR2

In order to use the iVRy Driver for SteamVR for Sony Playstation VR (PSVR), you will need to install the iVRy PSVR "Lite" or "Premium" DLC from:

iVRy Driver for SteamVR DEMO (PSVR Lite Edition)

iVRy Driver for SteamVR (PSVR Premium Edition)

In order to use the iVRy Driver for SteamVR for Sony Playstation VR2 (PSVR2), you will need to install the iVRy PSVR2 "Lite" or "Premium" DLC from:

iVRy Driver for SteamVR DEMO (PSVR2 Lite Edition)

iVRy Driver for SteamVR (PSVR2 Premium Edition)


SteamVR

To use the iVRy Driver for SteamVR, you MUST first install SteamVR from the Steam Store:

SteamVR


Before you start

IMPORTANT:

When using the iVRy Driver for SteamVR for the first time, it MUST be started from the "Launch" button, to ensure any additional services and drivers it requires get installed.
